channel.title: [Delta] My thread of many question [Delta]
channel.description:
[u][b]I've decided to make one of these because lately I've been spamming the board of my questions. So here are my questions.
Question 1: So I'm attempting to make a custom minigame.
How would I be able to change the coins needed to buy the items, and change the coins to whatever token i will be using. Please and thanks. :)
Question 2: How can I delete this?
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/6jddmb.png[/img]
I've tried going to deletethatobject but it didnt delete it. Please and thanks!
[/b][/u]
Thanks. Rep++ if helped.

item.title: [Delta] My thread of many question [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

I’ve done all that… Didn’t work.

Also, Whenever I buy something from the store, it buys 2 automatically.

heres my code:

if (MyShopID == 27) { if (playerItemsN[Slot7] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(3706, GetItemSlot(3706), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough Overkill tokens for this item."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] My thread of many question [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:10, topic:393319”] if((playerHasItem(6570) || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6570) && killedJad == 0){ deleteItem(6570, 1); playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape); }
Remove that

and remove this

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.");
return false;
}

how to change item names is in the client… in the class8 file (item names not objects)[/quote]

Gah. That’s dumb… Gotta upload 3 more clients…

Or! is there a way to upload the client without actually re-uploading it?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] My thread of many question [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

question 1: item.java for prices. search wanneshop in client.java to set up a new shop. it should be pretty self explanatory based on other shops.

question 2: You may not have the right coordinates for it. Try all 4 squares that the column takes up.

Question 3: Class8.java in your client.

question 4: code {[/code] find that. next to it should be "killedJad = " change it to “killedJad = 1;”

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] My thread of many question [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

if((playerHasItem(6570) || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6570) && killedJad == 0){
deleteItem(6570, 1);
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape);
}

Remove that

and remove this

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.");
return false;
}

how to change item names is in the client… in the class8 file (item names not objects)

Read full topic

find the coords for object and then go to objectmanager.java , find any object you have spawned, copy and paste that line underneath it. then change object id to -1, coords to the coords of the objct yur deleting, then face to -1

he didn’t say pi…
